LanguageData.sd_spaceship_cockpit.label: ship cockpit
LanguageData.sd_spaceship_cockpit.description: A cryptosleep casket hardened against the dangers of space. Capable of maintaining a person in cryptosleep for centuries in a space environment and surviving atmospheric re-entry.

LanguageData.sd_spaceship_cockpit_Frame.description: A cryptosleep casket hardened against the dangers of space. Capable of maintaining a person in cryptosleep for centuries in a space environment and surviving atmospheric re-entry.
